channel.title: De rep
channel.description: Fuck it. . . I get de repped twice for no reason? Then I get commented back for, "Don't whine you de repped me for reason, "Fuck off" When your the one's that de repped me for this topic...

item.title: De rep
item.dc:creator: @Thenium Thenium
item.description:
@Thenium wrote:

no no, i don’t think it’s funny. what happens after that happens is the fun part. you are just too dumb to see that

item.title: De rep
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“Pigrear, post:14, topic:339006”][quote author=demonlover14 link=topic=435391.msg3197328#msg3197328 date=1272924513]

It’s just -1 off your rep, it doesn’t really matter. I’ve had like 5 of them from Telenim on his variety of accounts.

Brink (+10/-22) T3arful (+10/-81) -1 i had a bad dream last night - mscp In topic February 14, 2010, 12:51:02 AM
Tertal (+10/-17) T3arful (+10/-81) -1 i had a bad dream last night - mscp In topic February 14, 2010, 12:50:17 AM
Kertin (+10/-12) T3arful (+10/-81) -1 i had a bad dream last night - mscp In topic February 14, 2010, 12:49:34 AM
eNim (+10/-23) T3arful (+10/-81) -1 retard - mscp In topic February 12, 2010, 12:50:59 PM
Xillion (+10/-0) T3arful (+10/-81) -1 nigger - mscp In topic January 30, 2010, 10:59:04 PM

My mom fucking flipped shit when she saw it. .
I just wan’t it removed…
[/quote]
Why does your mom look at your rep on mopar?
EDIT: also you realize by posting it, its going to be worse and worse everytime he does it now? The logical answer to this problem would be to get over it. He’s a troll, by being bothered by it your feeding his troll-like appetite.[/quote]
She walked by…

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I don’t think moparscape can handle --.

[quote=“demonlover14, post:10, topic:339006”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=435391.msg3197295#msg3197295 date=1272922808]
Get over your self, its just rep, also if you worry so much don’t look at your rep logs.
[/quote]
I look at them when I get re repped or de repped…[/quote]

Don’t look at, don’t even think about it, I rarely look at my rep logs and when I do I see the same thing over and over, I get de repped and then some one reps me.
